name: @s3arch/tim3
description: TIM3 application - part of the S3ARCH ecosystem

scripts.ao:build: npm run coordinator:build && npm run lock-manager:build && npm run token-manager:build && npm run state-manager:build && npm run mock-usda:build
scripts.ao:test: npm run coordinator:test && npm run lock-manager:test && npm run token-manager:test && npm run state-manager:test && npm run mock-usda:test
scripts.coordinator:build: cd ao/coordinator && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/app -w /app ghcr.io/permaweb/lua-squish:latest squish --minify
scripts.lock-manager:build: cd ao/lock-manager && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/app -w /app ghcr.io/permaweb/lua-squish:latest squish --minify
scripts.token-manager:build: cd ao/token-manager && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/app -w /app ghcr.io/permaweb/lua-squish:latest squish --minify
scripts.state-manager:build: cd ao/state-manager && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/app -w /app ghcr.io/permaweb/lua-squish:latest squish --minify
scripts.mock-usda:build: cd ao/mock-usda && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/app -w /app ghcr.io/permaweb/lua-squish:latest squish --minify
